txt.en: 'Thank you kindly for offering aid to our small camp. Yâshri is a capable gatherer who locates and acquires bits and baubles that are sold and used to support our outpost.\n\n'Travel west, seek her out, and see if you can assist her.'
'It is so kind for Dabôr to send an extra pair of hands to help me gather things in this area. Please note, it is quite dangerous as the restless Dead creep throughout the area.'
Dabôr the Breaker has requested that you assist Yâshri in gathering goods from Ghâr Mejet. When sold, these goods provide Harkhaphâr with much needed income to support the settlement.
Seek out Yâshri, located near Ghâr Mejet, and see if you can lend her aid.
Talk to Yâshri near Ghâr Mejet
